argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hdmaplna1.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | hdmaplna1.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | hdmaplna1.v | |- V = ( Base ` U ) |
| 4 |  | hdmaplna1.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) |
| 5 |  | hdmaplna1.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 6 |  | hdmaplna1.q | |- .+^ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 7 |  | hdmaplna1.s | |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) |
| 8 |  | hdmaplna1.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 9 |  | hdmaplna1.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 10 |  | hdmaplna1.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) |
| 11 |  | hdmaplna1.z | |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 8 | #P_dvhlmod | |- ( ph -> U e. LMod ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LFnl ` U ) = ( LFnl ` U ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 13, 14, 7, 8, 11 | #P_hdmapcl | |- ( ph -> ( S ` Z ) e. ( Base ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 13, 14, 2, 15, 8, 16 | #P_lcdvbaselfl | |- ( ph -> ( S ` Z ) e. ( LFnl ` U ) ) |
| 18 | 5, 6, 3, 4, 15 | #P_lfladd | |- ( ( U e. LMod /\ ( S ` Z ) e. ( LFnl ` U ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( S ` Z ) ` ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( ( ( S ` Z ) ` X ) .+^ ( ( S ` Z ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 19 | 12, 17, 9, 10, 18 | #P_syl112anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` Z ) ` ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( ( ( S ` Z ) ` X ) .+^ ( ( S ` Z ) ` Y ) ) ) |
